title: Play lol
body:
Good day fellow summoners. I need help, my laptop just got busted by some electricity mulfunction. Is there a chance that I could play using a smart tv from my external. I tried to look for the run file of lol at my smart tv and can't find it. Is there anyway I can locate and run my lol to my smar tv. Thanks alot in advance.

-sam

replies.body:
Ooooo that is very unfortunate to hear about your laptop!!{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

League is currently Pc & Mac only, so I'm pretty sure you won't be able to get it running on your smart tv. You could use it as your monitor for sure, but the tv itself won't be able to run the game on it's own.
